name: Ridiculously Good Mexican Hot Dogs
description: Vegan sausage is topped with pico de gallo, mustard, ketchup, mayonnaise, pickled jalapeño peppers, and vegan bacon. Served on a warm toasted bun.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine the tomatoes, onion, jalapeño, cilantro, and lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl combine the tomatoes, onion, jalapeño, cilantro, and lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet set to medium-low heat, sauté your vegan bacon until slightly crispy and chop into small pieces. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a skillet set to medium-low heat, sauté your vegan bacon until slightly crispy and chop into small pieces. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet set to medium heat, sauté your vegan sausage until golden brown, about 6 minutes. You can also grill it. Toast buns. Place vegan sausage in bun, top with vegan bacon, pico de gallo, mustard, ketchup, mayonnaise, and pickled jalapeños
recipeInstructions.name: In a skillet set to medium heat, sauté your vegan sausage until golden brown, about 6 minutes. You can also grill it. Toast buns. Place vegan sausage in bun, top with vegan bacon, pico de gallo, mustard, ketchup, mayonnaise, and pickled jalapeños

keywords: bbq recipes, beyond meat sausage, vegan hot dog
